text: Najib Ullah (February 14, 1914 to August 2, 1965) was an Afghan writer and ambassador. Ullah worked for the Foreign Office of Afghanistan for many years. He was also a representative to India, England and the United States. He worked as the Head of the Afghan group at UNESCO General Assembly in Beirut, Lebanon in 1948. ==Books== *Political History of Afghanistan, 1942-1944 *Strabo and Aryana, 1945 *Negotiations With Pakistan, 1948 *Islamic Literature, 1963 ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1965 deaths Category:Afghan writers Category:Ambassadors of Afghanistan Category:20th- century Afghan people
title: Najib Ullah
